biotools.summary: discovery of differential chromatin interactions via a self-similarity measure | SELFISH (Discovery of Differential Chromatin Interactions via a Self-Similarity Measure) is a tool for finding differential chromatin interactions between two Hi-C contact maps. It uses self-similarity to model interactions in a robust way. For more information read the full paper: Selfish: Discovery of Differential Chromatin Interactions via a Self-Similarity Measure. A Python implementation of Selfish is available at Ay-lab

bioschemas.name: Selfish
